TopicTitle: Where are all these values from?

Articles.Content:
Im probably missing something obvious but where are these values come from? Mod or Vanilla?

I'd like to remove them as they clutter everything and I dont care to see them but i cant figure out what mod enables them or if they are vanilla.

Edited December 27, 2016 by code99
I believe you can turn them off by hitting Alt-F12 and going through the thermal settings. Sorry, I'm not in front of KSP right now.
